title: Train Fault Causing Delays on North-South Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 南北线列车故障导致延误
title_translations.ms: Gangguan Kereta Api Menyebabkan Kelewatan di Laluan North-South
title_translations.ta: வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் ரயில் கோளாறு

updates.text: [NSL] UPDATE: Train service along the North South Line has resumed.
[NSL] UPDATE: Estimate 10mins additional travelling time from YioChuKang to MarinaBay towards Marina Bay due to train fault.
[NSL] UPDATE: Estimate 10 mins additional travel time from #YioChuKang towards #MarinaBay due to train fault.
[NSL]: Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #YioChuKang  to #MarinaBay towards MarinaBay due to train fault.
